title: Adjustable Dumbbell Set 20KG
description:
Durable and space-saving adjustable dumbbell set, perfect for full-body workouts at home or the gym.

Features:
- Adjustable weight from 2.5KG to 20KG to suit beginners and advanced users.
- Space-saving design eliminates the need for multiple dumbbells.
- Anti-slip handle ensures a firm grip during workouts.
- Made with high-quality materials for long-term durability.
- Ideal for exercises like bicep curls, lunges, chest presses, and more.
- Quick-lock mechanism for fast and safe weight adjustment.
- Compact and easy to store after use.
- Suitable for both home gyms and professional setups.
- Helps tone, strengthen, and build muscle across the entire body.
- Rust-resistant coating for extended life.

This set is perfect for anyone looking to get stronger, leaner, and more fit without needing a full rack of dumbbells.

title: Foldable Motorized Treadmill
description:
Compact and foldable treadmill with LCD display, perfect for cardio training at home.

Features:
- Powerful yet quiet motor ensures a smooth running experience.
- Space-saving foldable design with easy mobility wheels.
- LCD monitor displays time, speed, distance, and calories burned.
- Built-in shock absorption reduces impact on joints.
- Adjustable speed settings suitable for walking, jogging, or running.
- Emergency stop safety key for user protection.
- Pre-set workout programs to suit different fitness goals.
- Non-slip running belt with wide surface for comfort and stability.
- Sturdy frame supports intense cardio sessions.
- Ideal for burning fat, improving heart health, and increasing stamina.

Perfect for home users looking to maintain an active lifestyle in limited space.

title: Multi-Function Bench Press
description:
Sturdy bench press with adjustable angles for chest, shoulder, and triceps workouts.

Features:
- Adjustable incline, flat, and decline positions.
- Heavy-duty steel frame supports high weight capacity.
- Thick foam padding ensures comfort during heavy lifts.
- Compact design fits well in home gyms.
- Non-slip foot grips for stability and safety.
- Ideal for chest presses, shoulder presses, dumbbell rows, and ab workouts.
- Easy to assemble and adjust.
- Ergonomically designed to minimize strain and enhance form.
- Compatible with most barbell and dumbbell exercises.
- Foldable for convenient storage.

This bench press setup brings gym-level versatility to your home.

title: Vinyl Coated Kettlebell 16KG
description:
Ergonomic vinyl-coated kettlebell for strength, cardio, and endurance training.

Features:
- 16KG weight suitable for beginner to intermediate users.
- Vinyl coating reduces noise and protects flooring.
- Wide, ergonomic handle allows a firm, comfortable grip.
- Ideal for swings, squats, snatches, and more.
- Helps build core strength, endurance, and full-body stability.
- Flat bottom design ensures easy storage and safety.
- Rust-resistant and easy to clean.
- Compact and portable for home or outdoor workouts.
- Balanced weight distribution enhances workout performance.
- Adds intensity to HIIT, CrossFit, and strength routines.

An excellent all-in-one tool for functional strength and conditioning.

title: Wall Mounted Pull-Up Bar
description:
Heavy-duty pull-up bar for upper body training. Easy to install on any solid wall.

Features:
- Supports wide, close, and neutral grip variations.
- Durable steel construction ensures long-term use.
- Non-slip grips offer better comfort and control.
- Ideal for pull-ups, chin-ups, leg raises, and hanging core work.
- Strengthens arms, back, shoulders, and core.
- Easy installation with included hardware and user manual.
- Supports heavy loads up to 200KG.
- Compact design suitable for home or garage gyms.
- Powder-coated surface resists rust and wear.
- Can also be used as anchor for resistance bands or TRX straps.

Maximize upper body gains with this versatile pull-up bar setup.

title: Resistance Band Set (5 Pieces)
description:
Color-coded resistance bands for strength training, mobility, and rehab exercises.

Features:
- Includes 5 bands with varying resistance levels (Light to Extra Heavy).
- Made from high-quality natural latex for durability and flexibility.
- Compact and lightweightâ€”perfect for travel and workouts on the go.
- Ideal for strength training, stretching, yoga, and physical therapy.
- Color-coded for quick identification and progression.
- Comes with a carrying pouch for easy organization.
- Non-slip, skin-safe material ensures a comfortable grip.
- Suitable for men and women at all fitness levels.
- Helps improve mobility, joint stability, and muscle tone.
- Great addition to home, office, or outdoor workout routines.

A versatile fitness tool to support your journey to stronger, healthier living.
